an8.26:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati jivakambavane.
an8.26:1.2: Atha kho jivako komarabhacco yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho jivako komarabhacco bhagavantam etadavoca:
an8.26:1.4: “Yato kho, jivaka, buddham saranam gato hoti, dhammam saranam gato hoti, sangham saranam gato hoti;
an8.26:2.2: “Yato kho, jivaka, upasako panatipata pativirato hoti …pe… suramerayamajjapamadatthana pativirato hoti;
an8.26:2.3: ettavata kho, jivaka, upasako silava hoti”ti.
an8.26:3.1: “Kittavata pana, bhante, upasako attahitaya patipanno hoti, no parahitaya”ti?
an8.26:3.2: “Yato kho, jivaka, upasako attanava saddhasampanno hoti, no param saddhasampadaya samadapeti …pe…
an8.26:3.3: attanava atthamannaya dhammamannaya dhammanudhammappatipanno hoti, no param dhammanudhammappatipattiya samadapeti.
an8.26:3.4: Ettavata kho, jivaka, upasako attahitaya patipanno hoti, no parahitaya”ti.
an8.26:4.1: “Kittavata pana, bhante, upasako attahitaya ca patipanno hoti parahitaya ca”ti?
an8.26:4.2: “Yato kho, jivaka, upasako attana ca saddhasampanno hoti, paranca saddhasampadaya samadapeti;
an8.26:4.3: attana ca silasampanno hoti, paranca silasampadaya samadapeti;
an8.26:4.4: attana ca cagasampanno hoti, paranca cagasampadaya samadapeti;
an8.26:4.5: attana ca bhikkhunam dassanakamo hoti, paranca bhikkhunam dassane samadapeti;
an8.26:4.6: attana ca saddhammam sotukamo hoti, paranca saddhammassavane samadapeti;
an8.26:4.7: attana ca sutanam dhammanam dharanajatiko hoti, paranca dhammadharanaya samadapeti;
an8.26:4.8: attana ca sutanam dhammanam atthupaparikkhita hoti, paranca atthupaparikkhaya samadapeti;
an8.26:4.9: attana ca atthamannaya dhammamannaya dhammanudhammappatipanno hoti, paranca dhammanudhammappatipattiya samadapeti.
an8.26:4.10: Ettavata kho, jivaka, upasako attahitaya ca patipanno hoti parahitaya ca”ti.
